page.title: 15Our School
page.content: Sampford Arundel School is one hundred and five years old. It has twenty children in Class 1, twenty children in Class 2, and twenty-five children in Class 3. The headmaster is Mr. Brodie. In the cloak room there was a well. There are three classrooms, two of which are caravan classrooms. {School Clubs} After school on a Tuesday afternoon we have a Country Dancing Club. Our teachers for the Country Dancing Club are Mrs.Palfrey and Mr.and Mrs.Turner. Recently we went to Wells for a country dancing festival. It was the tenth year the festival had taken place, but unfortunately we could not dance because of the heavy rain. We also have Netball, Football, Cricket and Guitar Clubs.
